name: Speedchest 2D
description:
Controls
  • A/D or arrow keys to move
  • Space to Jump
  • R to reset game

A speedrun platformer, our first game to learn the basics of Unity. Uses the 2D Basic Platformer Pack from the Unity Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/tiles/2d-basic-platformer-pack-110887). Anything not in this pack, we made on Piskel (https://www.piskelapp.com/user/5019100600860672#)
